startUnitDescription: The houkouki fi al 3amal course is organized into 3 units. As you complete a unit, the next unit will unlock. Each unit includes learning objectives, topics, Q&A and self-practice resources.
learnAndCompleteAssessmentsDescription: Complete each topic in unit to progress. Each topic includes a pre-assessment, a training video, exercises, and a final assessment of your learning to advance.
getCertifiedDescription: Once you complete all topics within the three units with an assessment of 70% or higher, you will complete the course and unlock your houqouqi fi al 3amal certificate!
